bands.name: The Beatles
bands.info: The Beatles were an English rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960.

bands.name: Queen
bands.info: Queen are a British rock band formed in London in 1970.

bands.name: Led Zeppelin
bands.info: Led Zeppelin were an English rock band formed in London in 1968.

bands.name: Pink Floyd
bands.info: Pink Floyd were an English rock band formed in London in 1965.

bands.name: The Rolling Stones
bands.info: The Rolling Stones are an English rock band formed in London in 1962.

bands.name: AC/DC
bands.info: AC/DC are an Australian rock band formed in Sydney in 1973.

bands.name: Metallica
bands.info: Metallica are an American heavy metal band formed in Los Angeles in 1981.

bands.name: Nirvana
bands.info: Nirvana were an American rock band formed in Aberdeen, Washington in 1987.

bands.name: The Doors
bands.info: The Doors were an American rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1965.

bands.name: Guns N' Roses
bands.info: Guns N' Roses are an American hard rock band formed in Los Angeles in 1985.
